DOC.detailed_description: The NexGen LPS-FLex Mobile Bearing Knee receive FDA approval commercial distribution US December 10 , 2007 . The approval accordance `` condition approval '' perform 10-year post approval study evaluate longer-term safety effectiveness LPS-Flex Mobile Bearing Knee . The post approval study consist patient investigational device exemption study arm ( Group 1 ) well patient eligible total knee replacement choose receive LPS-Flex Mobile Knee ( Group 2 ) . Group 1 follow total 10 year date surgery . Group 2 follow total 5 year date surgery .
